comment: My shot from this morning. King Street. Old Town, Alexandria.
amr:
# ::snt My shot from this morning. King Street. Old Town, Alexandria.
(s / shoot-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :time (d / date-entity
            :dayperiod (m / morning)
            :mod (t / today))
      :location (s2 / street
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "King"
                  :op2 "Street"))
      :location (c / city-district
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Old"
                  :op2 "Town")
            :location (c2 / city
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Alexandria"))))

comment: The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
amr:
# ::snt The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "N"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / ethnic-group
                        :mod (a2 / all))
                  :op2 (g / group
                        :mod (s2 / society)
                        :mod (a3 / all)))
            :ARG1 (t / tolerate-01)))

comment: Let's keep racial slurs outta sight as well.
amr:
# ::snt Let's keep racial slurs outta sight as well.
(k / keep-04
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (w / we)
      :ARG1 (s / slur
            :mod (r / race)
            :ARG1-of (s2 / sight-01
                  :polarity -))
      :mod (a / as-well))

comment: Name calling speaks volumes about one's character.
